id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
			sceneid character(21),
			copyfile varchar(32)

sceneid character(21),
			collection smallint,
			tier char(2),
			downloaded char(1),
			organized char(1),
			explolded char(1),
			PRIMARY KEY (sceneid,collection,tier)

sensor varchar(16),
			csvheader varchar(64),
			xmlparentid varchar(64),
			xmlelement varchar(64),
			metatable varchar(32),
			metacolumn varchar(32),
			metatype  varchar(16),
			metalength integer,
			required char(1),
			defaultvalue varchar(32),
			PRIMARY KEY (sensor,metacolumn)

collection varchar(16),
			level smallint,
			sensor varchar(16),
			label varchar(255),
			xmlurl varchar(255),
			csvurl varchar(255),
			latestdate date,
			PRIMARY KEY (collection,level,sensor)

code varchar(16),
			rank smallint,
			PRIMARY KEY (code)
